pmhal_pmicComm.c File Reference

This file contains the BUS communication utility functions to communicate with the PMIC. More...

Functions

pmErrCode_t PMHALPmicCommConfigure (uint8_t i2cNum)
 Configure the I2C port used to control the PMIC. More...
 
pmErrCode_t PMHALPmicCommReadByte (uint8_t i2cNum, uint8_t slaveAddr, uint8_t regAddr, uint8_t *value)
 Read the 8-bit register value at the given register address from the device at the given slave address. It is the responsibility of the callee of this API to check for the returned status before using the value read. More...
 
pmErrCode_t PMHALPmicCommWriteByte (uint8_t i2cNum, uint8_t slaveAddr, uint8_t regAddr, uint8_t value)
 Write the given 8-bit value to the register at the given address. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file contains the BUS communication utility functions to communicate with the PMIC.
